name: Charge Code and Date
description: Specifies whether a charge action is based on an invocation event or is time-based.

fields.name: Invocation Event
fields.description: Specifies the code for the event precipitating/triggering the charge activity. Refer to HL7 Table 0100 - Invocation event for valid values.

fields.name: Date/Time
fields.description: The second component is used to express the exact time to charge for the ordered service; it is used only when the CCD.1 value is T. When used, it is expressed as a DTM data type.
